did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: HERE General President's Files on Microfilm,

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Hotel Employees and Restaurant Employees International Union (HERE)

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Hotel Employees and Restaurant Employees Union (HERE), was a United States labor union representing workers of the hospitality industry, formed in 1891. In 2004, HERE merged with the Union of Needletrades, Industrial, and Textile Employees (UNITE) to form UNITE HERE. HERE and later UNITE HERE were affiliated with the AFL-CIO until September 2005, when the General Executive Board of UNITE HERE voted in to leave the AFL-CIO and join with the Change to Win Coalition.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Negative copies of GP Local Corresp. - Reel 1-9, 11-13, available upon request.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Hotel Employees and Restaurant Employees International Union
Hotel, Hospital, Restaurant, and Tavern Employees' Union

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: HERE General President's Files on Microfilm #6199/008 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
